title: SpreadScheduleTypeEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify a long or short spread value.

oneOf.title: Long
oneOf.description: Represents a Long Spread Schedule. Spread schedules defined as 'Long' will be applied to Long Positions.

oneOf.title: Short
oneOf.description: Represents a Short Spread Schedule. Spread schedules defined as 'Short' will be applied to Short Positions.
